item.title: Time to taste my kombucha and pickles
item.description: I am making kombucha. (a SCOBY from a neighbor + black tea) I am making pickles. (cucumbers in a jar with salt) After more than a week of letting each vessle do it’s thing, I moved the jar of kombucha into a bottle (for the second stage of brewing), and I ate a what can now be called a pickle. The kombucha was flat and still too sweet. The pickle was mushy, and not quite bitter.
